title: SOLD - 1929 Churchman Babe Ruth plus bonus item
author: mikemcgrail

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1929 Churchman Babe Ruth plus bonus item
posts.post_content:
Here’s your chance to get a playing era card of the Babe without having to sell a kidney.

This 1929 WA & AC Churchman card is crease free with some minor soiling and corner rounding. I guess this would grade as a 2 or 3 if you want to get it entombed.

Also included is a nice classic R.H. Palenske image of the Babe on leather. This seems to be cut from some kind of notebook or publication. I believe it dates from the 1950s.

See images below. PM with any questions or requests.

Price is $OLD

PayPal FF preferred. Shipping and insurance is included in the price.
This is probably the finest value for a nice playing era Babe Ruth item (and bonus too) I have seen in a long, long time. Best of luck with your sale!

Thanks for your positive comment James!

I did indeed price this to sell.
